lilS DOCUMENT IS THE PROPERTY OP HIS BRITANNIC MAJESTY'S GOVERNMENT). G RET.. 139 (36). COPY NO, C A B I N E To COMPOSITION OF CABINET COMMITTEES. I am instructed by the Prime Minister to circulate a revised list of Cabinet Committees, showing theirpresent composition. (Signed) M.P.A. RANEEY, Secretary to the Cabinet.I 2, Whitehall Gardens, SoW.1. 29th June, 1956. LIST OF CABINET COMMITTEES. Ill 2 COMMITTEE OF HOME AFFAIRS. 3 SUPPLY; AM) TRANSPORT COMMITTEE, 4 IRISH SITUATION COMMITTEE. 5 POLITICAL COMMITTEE; 6 COMMITTEE ON THE REPORTS OF THE COMMISSIONERS FOR THE SPECIAL AREAS. 7 GENERAL PURPOSES COMMITTEE. 8 COMMITTEE ON THE DRAFT REGULATIONS OF THE UNEMPLOYMENT ASSISTANCE BOARD. 9 COMMITTEE ON POLITICAL AND ECONOMIC RELATIONS WITH JAPAN.10 COMMITTEE ON THE ORGANISATION OF THE COAL-MINING INDUSTRY.11 COMMITTEE ON GERMANY.12 COMMITTEE ON BROADCASTING.13 COMMITTEE ON TRADE AND AGRICULTURE.14 COMMITTEE ON FOREIGN POLICY.15 COMMITTEE ON ANGLO-EGYPTIAN CONVERSATIONS.16 COMMITTEE ON THE POSITION OP THE FLEET IN THE MEDITERRANEAN.17 COMMITTEE ON THE IMPERIAL CONFERENCE.18 COMMITTEE ON THE CORONATION OATH.19 COMMITTEE ON AIR SERVICES IN THE MEDITERRANEAN.20 COMMITTEE ON ELECTRICITY DISTRIBUTION.
